Subskills.name: Ferocious Swipe
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike chance when using blade strike.

Subskills.name: Blade's Edge
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage when using blade strike.

Subskills.name: Skewering Blades
Subskills.description: Unleash flying blades on monster hit dealing area of effect damage and inflict bleeding.

Subskills.name: Lethal Swing
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by blade strike.

Subskills.name: Blade Master
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using blade strike.

Subskills.name: Catch Up Blade
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to throw your weapon with force dealing additional damage and bouncing from terrain.

Subskills.name: Cleaving Slash
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect of blade strike.

Subskills.name: Giant Slayer
Subskills.description: Critical strike damage by blade strike is increased based on your vitality.

Subskills.name: Agile Striker
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to strike additional times.

Subskills.name: Bounty Hunting
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to increase your strength for a short period of time.

Subskills.name: Tribal Commander
Subskills.description: Gain a portion of your strength as all attributes.

Subskills.name: Brutalizing Cleave
Subskills.description: Gain increased attack range and damage slightly knocking enemies back stunning them.

Subskills.name: Stacked Blade
Subskills.description: Striking a monster applies a debuff which when reaching max stacks will unleash multiple blades dealing additional damage and bouncing from terrain.
